data.current_summary: Get a list of supported languages.
data.description_suggestion: Retrieves the list of languages supported by LanguageTool for text checking. Returns an array of language codes and names that can be used with the /check endpoint. Useful for determining which languages are available for grammar and style checking.
data.reasoning: The description is completely empty, providing no context about what languages are returned or how to use them. Added information about return format, use case with /check endpoint, and domain context to help AI agents understand the operation's purpose and how it relates to other operations.

message: Operation 'get_/words' has semantic quality issues: vague_summary, missing_context, missing_output_details. Summary is generic and doesn't clarify that these are personal dictionaries. Description lacks context about why personal dictionaries exist (customization), authentication requirements, and what the response contains. Enhanced summary to specify 'personal dictionaries' and expanded description to explain the purpose and authentication requirement for better AI agent understanding.

data.current_description: List words in the user's personal dictionaries.
data.description_suggestion: Retrieves words stored in the authenticated user's personal dictionaries. Personal dictionaries are used to customize LanguageTool's grammar and style checking by adding domain-specific or personal terms. Returns a list of words with their associated dictionary information. Requires authentication.
data.reasoning: Summary is generic and doesn't clarify that these are personal dictionaries. Description lacks context about why personal dictionaries exist (customization), authentication requirements, and what the response contains. Enhanced summary to specify 'personal dictionaries' and expanded description to explain the purpose and authentication requirement for better AI agent understanding.

message: Operation 'post_/words/add' has semantic quality issues: missing_output_details, missing_context. Summary is clear and actionable. Description mentions the 500-word limit but lacks clarity about authentication requirements, what the operation returns, and the purpose of personal dictionaries. Reorganized description to clarify authentication, purpose, limits, return value, and support contact information for better AI agent interpretability.

data.current_description: Add a word to one of the user's personal dictionaries. Please note that this feature is considered to be used for personal dictionaries which must not contain more than 500 words. If this is an issue for you, please contact us.
data.description_suggestion: Add a word to one of the authenticated user's personal dictionaries to customize grammar and style checking. Personal dictionaries are limited to 500 words per dictionary. Returns confirmation of the word addition. Requires authentication. Contact support if you need higher limits.
data.reasoning: Summary is clear and actionable. Description mentions the 500-word limit but lacks clarity about authentication requirements, what the operation returns, and the purpose of personal dictionaries. Reorganized description to clarify authentication, purpose, limits, return value, and support contact information for better AI agent interpretability.

data.current_description: Remove a word from one of the user's personal dictionaries.
data.description_suggestion: Remove a word from one of the authenticated user's personal dictionaries. This allows customization of LanguageTool's grammar and style checking by removing previously added terms. Returns confirmation of the word removal. Requires authentication.
